entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 8:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: SE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h near Agassiz late in the evening and overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
